entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0195.10622] us-gaap:AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalSharebasedCompensationRequisiteServicePeriodRecognitionValue has a value of 9,000 and has been used with the common stock Member. This element should not have a value when used with the common stock [Member]. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly or if a different element or member should be used.
The properties of this us-gaap:AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalSharebasedCompensationRequisiteServicePeriodRecognitionValue fact are: Period :2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:CommonStockMember Unit : USD Rule Element Id:10622 Rule version: 26.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1072379/000141057823000185/nwbo-20221231x10k.htm 67

property.name: label
property.value: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Share-based Compensation, Requisite Service Period Recognition

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0195.10622] us-gaap:AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalSharebasedCompensationRequisiteServicePeriodRecognitionValue has a value of 4,000 and has been used with the common stock Member. This element should not have a value when used with the common stock [Member]. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly or if a different element or member should be used.
